incidentSummary: Pipeline failure in contoso-corp: Infrastructure failure affecting 275 users
incidentDescription:
Pipeline failures detected in organization contoso-corp.

Failure Details:
- Stage: Agent allocation
- Type: Infrastructure failure
- Impact Level: High - Major functionality impaired
- Affected Users: 275

Error Messages:
- No agents available in pool "Build-Pool-Production"
- Agent allocation timeout after 10 minutes
- Pool capacity exceeded: 0/50 agents available

Troubleshooting performed:
- Checked agent pool status using Azure DevOps REST API: All 50 agents in offline state
- Investigated agent pool infrastructure: VMSS scale set experiencing connectivity issues
- Initiated agent pool recovery procedure: Restarted VMSS instances, 35/50 agents back online
- Monitored pipeline queue processing: Queue backlog processing resumed, estimated clear time 2 hours

mitigationActions.action: Checked agent pool status using Azure DevOps REST API
